021877214995244190654.description:
We are seeking a skilled Automation Engineer to help develop a solution for automating data entry and form autofill workflows for custom use cases. The project involves creating scripts to input user-provided data into various online forms, ensuring accuracy, efficiency, and seamless operation.  
  
Project Scope  
The project will focus on creating a robust and flexible automation tool for streamlining data entry tasks. The tool will:  
  
Retrieve structured data (e.g., user information, text inputs, file uploads) from a database or API.  
Autofill and submit the data into specific online forms or systems.  
Implement techniques to ensure compatibility and reliability across multiple platforms.  
Key Deliverables  
Custom Form Autofill Tool:  
  
Create scripts to autofill and submit data into online forms, tailored for each platform.  
Handle dynamic fields, dropdown menus, file uploads, and multi-step forms.  
Error Handling and Reporting:  
  
Implement error detection to identify issues like failed submissions or incorrect data formats.  
Provide detailed logs to monitor script performance and identify errors.  
Scalable Architecture:  
  
Design a solution that can handle varying volumes of data entry tasks efficiently.  
Ensure compatibility with different platforms and form structures.  
Performance Optimization:  
  
Minimize input errors and submission failures.  
Optimize execution speed while maintaining data accuracy.  
Requirements  
Technical Skills:  
  
Proficiency in Python or other relevant programming languages.  
Experience with web automation frameworks like Selenium.  
Ability to work with APIs, databases, and data manipulation tools.  
Experience:  
  
Proven track record of developing automation tools for data entry or form submissions.  
Knowledge of handling multi-step forms and dynamic fields.  
Problem-Solving:  
  
Ability to troubleshoot and resolve issues with compatibility, form structures, or data mismatches.  
Experience optimizing workflows for efficiency and reliability.  
Additional Information  
Data Source: The data to be entered will be provided via API or other structured formats.  
Target Platforms: A list of platforms will be provided, and scripts must be tailored to handle their unique requirements.  
Error Logs: Detailed reporting is essential to monitor performance and troubleshoot issues effectively.  
This project is ideal for automation engineers who enjoy creating efficient, reliable tools that simplify repetitive workflows. If you’re interested, please share your experience, examples of similar work, and your proposed approach to building these automation scripts.

021877148463587724222.description:
I am seeking a developer or automation specialist to build a system that:

1. Parses incoming property leads (via email and/or SMS) to extract relevant
information (address, price, units, etc.).

2. Queries RentCast (or a similar rent estimate service) to gather rental
data (current rent, rent comps, etc.).

3. Populates a Google Sheet with key data (address, rent estimate, cash-on-
cash return, etc.).

4. Handles special logic for multi-unit properties (7+ units) to store or
transform data differently.

5. Keeps daily API costs to under $0.50/day.


---

2. Project Goals



Automation: Eliminate manual copy-pasting of property addresses, rent
estimates, and ROI calculations.

Accuracy: Ensure data extracted and rent estimates are consistently accurate.

Scalability & Cost Control: Handle a growing number of leads while staying
within a $0.50/day API budget.



---

3. Scope and Requirements



3.1. Data Capture & Parsing

1. Sources: The system should capture data from:

Email: Some leads arrive via email (with property details or direct links to
listings).

Text Messages (SMS): Some leads arrive via text, which may be forwarded
through services like Twilio or Zapier.



2. Parsing Fields:

Address (required for RentCast lookup)

Property Purchase Price (if available)

Number of Units (important for 7+ unit logic)

Any additional fields that might be relevant (e.g., link to the listing,
agent’s contact info, etc.).



3. Preferred Tools (flexible):

Zapier, Make (Integromat), or a custom solution in Python/Node.js/Google Apps
Script.

Must ensure reliability and easy maintainability.




3.2. RentCast Integration

1. Retrieve Rent Estimates:

Use RentCast’s API (or equivalent) to get current rent, high/low estimates, or
average rents for the ZIP code.

If the property listing already contains the current rent, incorporate that
into the data.



2. API Cost Constraints:

The system should not exceed $0.50/day in API usage.

Minimize duplicates: Only call RentCast once per unique address.

Potentially batch calls or check for repeated addresses.




3.3. Google Sheets Integration

1. Data Columns in Google Sheets should include (but aren’t limited to):

Timestamp (date the lead was processed)

Address

Purchase Price

Number of Units

Monthly Rent Estimate

Other rent comps or relevant data from RentCast

Cash-on-Cash Return (see next section)

Notes or Status field for manual follow-up.



2. Handling 7+ Units:

If Units less than 7, either:

Insert data into a separate tab (e.g., “7+ Units” tab), or

Encode or summarize the data differently (e.g., partial data, redacted
financials).





3.4. Cash-on-Cash Return Calculation

1. Inputs:

Purchase Price (from the lead or manually estimated)

Rent (from the listing and/or RentCast estimates)

Down Payment (might be a standard % or a column in the sheet)

Expenses (option to assume a percentage or a fixed amount)

Mortgage Payment (if financed; can be estimated or left as a variable input)



2. Formula:

Annual Net Cash Flow = (Monthly Rent – Monthly Expenses – Mortgage) × 12

Total Cash Invested = Down Payment + Closing Costs (if applicable)

Cash-on-Cash Return % = (Annual Net Cash Flow / Total Cash Invested) × 100



3. Implementation:

Can be calculated within Google Sheets (preferred for easier tweaking of
assumptions).

Alternatively, can be calculated in the automation script.




3.5. Error Handling & Edge Cases

1. Duplicate Addresses: If the same property address is sent multiple times,
ensure we do not duplicate RentCast calls unnecessarily.


2. Missing Data: Some leads may be missing purchase price or unit count. The
system should log them but still attempt to fill whatever data is available.


3. Notification/Logging: If a lead is processed successfully, optionally send
a notification (email or Slack) if it meets a certain ROI threshold
(optional).




---

4. Technical Details & Constraints


5. Platform/Hosting:

If using a no-code tool (Zapier, Make), you must specify the steps needed.

If using a custom script (e.g., Google Apps Script or a serverless function),
it must be well-documented for future maintenance.



6. User Authentication:

Securely handle the RentCast API key (do not store in plain text in public
code repositories).



7. Daily API Budget:

Provide a method to track the number of calls to ensure we stay under
$0.50/day.

Implement caching or a check on previously-seen addresses.



8. Google Sheet Setup:

Must be able to handle 100+ properties without performance issues.

Must accommodate dynamic columns for additional data or notes.





---

5. Deliverables


6. Fully Functional Automated Workflow

Demonstrates end-to-end process: from an example email/SMS to data populating
in Google Sheets with rent estimates and calculations.



7. Configuration & Setup Guide

Instructions on how to set up or modify the API keys (RentCast, Twilio, etc.).

Instructions on how to edit the Google Sheet formulas or columns.



8. Source Code/Access

If code-based: Provide the script files or links to GitHub.

If no-code: Provide screenshots or instructions for the Zapier/Make workflows.



9. Testing & Validation

At least one test property address to confirm the system retrieves rent data,
calculates ROI, and handles the 7+ unit logic.



10. Documentation

A short write-up on how to maintain and troubleshoot the system in case of
errors (e.g., API downtime, changes in email format).





---

6. Timeline



Proposal Submission: Immediately upon job posting.

Project Start: Within 1 week of awarding the job.

MVP Completion: 1–2 weeks after project start (basic address parsing + rent
data retrieval + sheet entry).

Final Delivery: 2–3 weeks after project start (include the ROI calculations,
7+ unit handling, thorough testing).



---

7. Budget



Open to proposals, with an emphasis on:

Minimizing monthly costs (aiming for $15/month total, including the RentCast
usage).

Ensuring reliability of the automation.



---

8. Selection Criteria


9. Relevant Experience: Experience with property analysis, automating
email/SMS parsing, Google Sheets, or Zapier/Make.


10. Portfolio/References: Previous work or references for similar automation
tasks.


11. Solution Approach: Clear plan to keep API calls under $0.50/day, handle
duplicates, and maintain data integrity.


12. Communication & Documentation: Ability to provide clear instructions and
maintenance guidance.




---

9. How to Apply / Next Steps



Submit a brief proposal explaining:

1. Your approach (Zapier? Custom script?)


2. High-level architecture you envision


3. Estimated timeline and cost



Provide examples or links to similar projects you’ve completed.
Include the word “PropertyROI” in your response to confirm you’ve read the
details.


---

Also want realtor interface to see scenarios and enter repairs or answer
missing quality questions about property

Bonus $15 if can like with offermarket us for rates

021877139327902878654.description:
I used Replit, mainly its AI agent, to build and deploy a MERN web app via
Replit. I then created a marketing site for it using WordPress and managed
subscriptions with WooCommerce.  
  
I set up user authentication for the web app to recognize users who have
created accounts on my WordPress site. I am using JWT authentification.  
  
However, I'm having trouble getting it to identify whether they have purchased
a subscription and if it is active. The subscription plugin I am using is
SUBSCRIPTIONS FOR WOOCOMMERCE by WP Swings.  
  
I need a developer to execute this implementation. I want to create a
marketing site where users can purchase subscription access and create an
account.  
  
Then, we can identify if those users have an account and a subscription to the
web app. If they have a subscription, I would like to give them access to the
web app as long as it is active.

021876922798929999491.description:
A previous developer helped me build an AI voice agent in VAPI and n8n.  
  
The agent currently takes inbound calls like a receptionist. The agent responds to callers giving business information, pricing and FAQs. It also sets appointments by looking at a calendar (already setup) and suggests available times.  
  
Current tech stack  
GCP - google calendar  
N8n - workflows  
VAPI - voice AI  
OpenAI - chat summarisation  
Twilio - phone number  
  
We are stuck on a Stripe implementation where the agent sends a payment link (eg via email or SMS) to the caller to make a payment to confirm the appointment. Need support specifically in completing this part of the flow.  
  
So the flow should be  
1. Caller rings number  
2.  AI agent answers and provides business information, and offers to  set up an appointment   
3. Callers asks availability on certain days  
4. agent checks calendar and confirms or proposes alternative times  
5. Caller agree on time, agent books the appointment and sends calendar
invite and confirms booking over phone, then politely ends call.  
  
  
Additional step to be added  
- before step 5 above, Agent asks caller for email address to send a payment
link (stripe)  
- after caller completes payment - agent checks for payment confirmation. If
confirmed, agent tells caller that the payment is successful and then we move
to step 5 above.  
- If payment unsuccessful, it tells caller that it was unsuccessful and asks
to try again. If still unsuccessful, it tells caller that the appointment is
not confirmed and that we will pass on to someone who will call back to take
payment over the phone.  
  
This should be a quick integration as it is testing the flow and stripe
integration. We have done most of the work and requires an experienced AI
agent to complete.  
  
This must be completed by Friday this week.
021876922798929999491.title: N8n VAPI Stripe - integration support

021876909175860039060.description:
We are looking to build an AI-powered classroom website for teachers, very similar in functionality to Google Classroom except this will include AI chat tasks that are graded.  
  
The website will allow teachers to create and manage multiple classrooms for different subjects. In each classroom, the teacher can upload educational content in the form of PDF files to serve as modules. Students can access and complete tasks.  
  
Features:  
  
    Teachers can create modules and upload PDF files with relevant content.  
    Teachers can set instructions for the AI bot (e.g., "10 questions a day on addition").  
    Students log into their profiles daily, select the module, and interact with the AI chatbot.  
    The AI bot will present 10 questions, and when the student answers correctly, it will proceed to the next question. If the student answers incorrectly, the bot will explain the mistake and allow the student to ask questions before moving forward.  
    At the end of the 10 questions, the AI bot records the student’s score, which is saved in a gradebook similar to Google Classroom.  
    The platform tracks the student’s overall progress and grades across multiple modules (e.g., Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication, Division for math).  
  
Teacher’s Dashboard:  
  
    Teachers can monitor student progress, view grades, and track the completion of modules.  
    Teachers can create different classrooms for various subjects and upload multiple modules for each.  
  
Additional Requirement: The website should be designed with future mobile app
integration in mind. We plan to transition the platform into a mobile app
(iOS) via the App Store at a later point, allowing students to easily access
and complete their modules on their phones. Please design the site with this
scalability in mind.  
  
Requirements:  
  
    Experience in building interactive web platforms with AI integration.  
    Familiarity with building gradebook systems and dashboards for educators.  
    Experience with chatbot development and AI-powered learning tools.  
    WordPress is the preferred platform for this project. We are looking for a developer who is experienced with WordPress and its plugins. Please include suggestions for any plugins you would consider using to build the site.  
  
To Be Considered: If you are interested in this project, please submit a proof
of concept. This could include any past AI-integrated projects (student,
teacher, or user group projects, etc.) and a clear plan for how you would
execute this project. Please include details on the plugins you would use, how
you would integrate the AI functionality, and any tools or technologies you
would recommend for this build.

021877185814385142612.description: We’re building an AI-powered SaaS platform aimed at revolutionizing healthcare communication. Our goal is to create a real-time speech-to-text, text-to-speech, and live language translation system tailored specifically for medical environments. This system must be able to handle multiple languages, be extremely accurate in its translations, and operate seamlessly in real-time, ensuring it can be used in high-stress situations without errors. One of our key challenges is ensuring voice differentiation based on context — for instance, the system should automatically detect whether it's a male or female speaker and adjust the voice accordingly. We also need the platform to provide natural-sounding speech outputs, so the voice feels human and approachable, particularly in high-stress healthcare settings where patient comfort and trust are critical. We’re also very focused on making sure the system’s output is clear and easy to understand in emergency scenarios. The system must adhere to the strictest privacy standards and comply with GDPR regulations, as we will be handling sensitive patient data. We need someone with experience in building secure, scalable platforms with a deep understanding of AI, natural language processing, and large language models like GPT, as well as real-time data processing. Ideally, you’ll also have experience integrating APIs, working with cloud services, and ensuring smooth interactions between text, voice, and various languages in real-time. You should be comfortable working with both frontend and backend technologies, have a strong grasp of SaaS development, and be capable of collaborating with a team to deliver timely, high-quality work. We value innovation and are looking for a partner who’s excited about the opportunity to push boundaries in healthcare technology. We also need someone who understands the importance of accuracy, reliability, and empathy when it comes to medical communication, as this could significantly impact the quality of care that the patients receive. This is a chance to join a project with a huge potential for positive impact on millions of people around the world. If you’re passionate about AI, healthcare, and solving real-world problems, we’d love to have you on board. -Soft Skills:

021877501232517548990.description:
Position Overview:  We are seeking a highly skilled and detail-oriented Data Analytics Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, building, and maintaining robust data pipelines, performing data migrations, and ensuring data quality through cleansing and validation processes. This role requires a strong understanding of best practices in data engineering and analytics, with a focus on delivering scalable, reliable, and efficient solutions to support business intelligence and decision-making.  
  
Key Responsibilities:  
1. Data Pipeline Development  
Design, develop, and maintain ETL/ELT pipelines to extract, transform, and load data from various sources into data warehouses, lakes, or other storage systems.  
Optimize pipelines for performance, scalability, and reliability.  
Automate data workflows using tools such as Apache Airflow, AWS Glue, or similar orchestration platforms.  
2. Data Migration  
Perform data migrations across systems (on-premises to cloud, database upgrades, etc.) with minimal downtime and data integrity.  
Develop migration scripts and processes to handle large-scale data transfers efficiently.  
Validate migrated data to ensure completeness and accuracy.  
3. Data Cleansing and Validation  
Identify and resolve data quality issues, including missing, duplicate, or inconsistent data.  
Implement data profiling and validation processes to ensure data accuracy and integrity.  
Collaborate with stakeholders to define data quality metrics and thresholds.  
4. Collaboration and Stakeholder Engagement  
Work closely with data scientists, analysts, and business teams to understand data requirements and deliver actionable insights.  
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate data pipelines with existing tools and systems.  
Communicate technical concepts clearly to non-technical stakeholders.  
5. Best Practices and Documentation  
Follow industry best practices for data engineering, including modular design, version control, and testing.  
Document data workflows, pipelines, and processes for transparency and future reference.  
Ensure compliance with data governance policies, security standards, and privacy regulations (e.g., GDPR, CCPA).  
6. Continuous Improvement  
Monitor and troubleshoot data pipelines to identify bottlenecks and optimize performance.  
Stay updated on the latest trends, tools, and technologies in data engineering and analytics.  
Proactively suggest improvements to existing systems and processes.  
Required Qualifications:  
Technical Skills  
Strong programming skills in Python, SQL, or similar languages.  
Experience with ETL/ELT tools such as Apache Airflow, Talend, AWS Glue, or dbt.  
Proficiency in working with relational databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQL Server) and data warehouses (e.g., Snowflake, BigQuery, Redshift).  
Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) and their data services.  
Experience with data modeling, schema design, and query optimization.  
Knowledge of data formats like JSON, Parquet, and Avro.  
Soft Skills  
Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.  
Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.  
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

021877535309907954622.description: Some of our partners get lots of DMs on their social media asking tons of questions. We built an AI to help them answer these questions, and they want to direct those people to their AI. This project would be an ongoing project, a few hours per day, answering people's questions and linking them to the AI for more info. An example might be: Steve asks: "what's the best workout for getting bigger biceps?" You might say something like: Hey Steve! 💪 Thanks for reaching out about building bigger biceps. 021877430632172293054.description:
In September, we developed an AI chatbot using the standard RAG (Retrieval-
Augmented Generation) LangChain framework combined with Azure API to chat with
PDFs. Specifically, we leveraged Azure Form Recognizer to remove headers,
footers, and specific parts of PDFs, enhancing the context of ingested data
into the vector database. Additionally, we used the OpenAI Vision model to
describe images within PDFs and store these descriptions in the vector
database.  
  
Problem:  
Since September, updates to dependencies have caused the code to stop working
as expected. The system now fails to capture and describe images using the
OpenAI Vision model during ingestion.  
  
After investigating, I found that OpenAI has changed the name of the Vision
model and some functions within the LangChain framework, requiring updates. I
decided to update all dependencies, but this introduced additional issues with
Azure. Azure has undergone significant changes, replacing Form Recognizer with
Azure AI Document Intelligence, further complicating the update process.  
  
I am looking for someone to help restore the functionalities of my chatbot,
ensuring all dependencies are updated and the bot works as intended.  
  
Future Scope:  
As a follow-up task, there may be an opportunity to migrate from the classical
RAG framework to the GraphRAG framework, which is a cutting-edge and trending
approach.
021877430632172293054.title: Update and repair AI chatbot

021877434923637345214.description:
We are looking for a skilled developer or team to design and implement a robust **AI-powered pre-interview screening module** for our web application.
The module should leverage artificial intelligence to generate interview questions, create tests, and assess candidates' skills across a variety of technologies and roles.

The ideal candidate will have expertise in building scalable, user-friendly web applications, and experience in integrating AI models for real-time content generation.

---

### **Responsibilities**

- **Module Design**: Develop a pre-interview screening module that allows recruiters to create customizable tests for candidates.
- **AI Integration**: Use AI/ML technologies to dynamically generate interview questions (MCQs, coding challenges, scenario-based questions) across multiple technologies (e.g., Python, Java, AWS, Data Science).
- **User Management**: Include features for recruiters to create job-specific assessments and for candidates to take tests.
- **Skill Evaluation**: Automate grading for coding challenges, MCQs, and scenario-based questions.
- **Scalability**: Ensure the module supports high concurrency and is optimized for performance.
- **Reporting and Analytics**: Provide recruiters with detailed candidate performance reports, including strengths and weaknesses.

### **Requirements**

#### **Technical Skills**
- **Frontend Development**: Experience with React, Angular, or Vue.js for a responsive and intuitive user interface.
- **Backend Development**: Proficiency in Node.js, Django, or FastAPI for scalable APIs and server-side logic.
- **AI Expertise**:
  - Familiarity with NLP and AI/ML frameworks (e.g., OpenAI API, Hugging Face, TensorFlow, PyTorch).
  - Ability to fine-tune pre-trained language models (e.g., GPT) to generate domain-specific interview questions.
- **Database**: Knowledge of SQL (PostgreSQL/MySQL) and NoSQL databases (MongoDB, DynamoDB).
- **DevOps**: Experience with containerization (Docker) and cloud deployment (AWS ECS, Azure, or GCP).

#### **Soft Skills**
- Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
- Ability to understand recruitment processes and translate them into functional software features.
- Effective communication and collaboration skills.

### **Preferred Qualifications**
- Prior experience in building recruitment or assessment platforms.
- Familiarity with coding challenge evaluation tools (e.g., HackerRank, CodeSignal).
- Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines for seamless deployment.
- Understanding of cloud cost optimization strategies.

### **Project Scope**
The module will include:
1. **Admin/Recruiter Features**:
      Generate tests based on job roles and skill requirements.
   - Define difficulty levels (easy, medium, hard).
   - Schedule tests and invite candidates via email.
   - View detailed candidate reports.  based on the answers by candidate

2. **Candidate Features**:
   - Take tests in a secure environment (time-limited, plagiarism detection).
   - View test instructions and submit answers.

3. **AI Capabilities**:
   - Dynamic question generation for technologies such as Python, Java, AWS, Data Science, etc.
   - Code auto-grading and scenario-based question evaluation.
   - Generate real-time feedback for candidates.

4. **Analytics and Reporting**:
   - Provide recruiter dashboards with test insights (average scores, completion rates).
   - Identify top-performing candidates automatically.

---

### **Deliverables**
- Fully functional pre-interview screening module integrated with our web application.
- Comprehensive documentation for deployment, maintenance, and troubleshooting.
- Training sessions for our team on using the module.
021877434923637345214.title: AI-Powered Pre-Interview Screening Module Developer

021877521127015779262.description:
I purchase products on Amazon using a Amazon business account, and I’d like to put the tracking numbers for these orders in to our CRM (Zoho) through an automated process.  
  
Step 1. I manually place an order through out Amazon business account.  
  
Step 2. Order ships, and I receive an email from Amazon that is has shipped, however this does not have the tracking number listed inline in the email. I click the link “Track Your Package” to open Amazon page showing the tracking number. The order confirmation contains the Amazon order number  
  
Step 3. I copy the Amazon order number and paste it in to our CRM (Zoho) to open the purchase order.  
  
Step 4. I copy/paste the tracking number from Amazon in to the purchase order in Zoho in to the Tracking Number field. Sometimes there are multiple tracking numbers for a single order, and I append each tracking number in to the same field with a command and a space after each.  
  
I’d like an automated method to get the tracking number in to the purchase order in Zoho. If you are aware of a API for Amazon Business, I’d prefer that option to use it to connect. Based on my initial research, Amazon Business doesn’t appear to have a public API to connect to.  
  
If indeed no API is available, I’m open to solutions - a scraping script (Amazon business account is behind a login), make.com automation triggered when an email is received, etc.
021877521127015779262.title: Amazon tracking number automation
021877521127015779262.client_infomation: United States | 90 jobs posted | $124K total spent | Member since Feb 9, 2011

021877528995618330512.description:
We are building a cloud-based platform to simplify the procurement of goods and services for home-schooled students. The application supports multiple user roles, including parents/guardians, teachers, enrichment staff, vendors, and administrators. Core features include an approval workflow, vendor management, AI-powered support, and detailed reporting. The system is multi- tenant, offering each customer a dedicated instance, and utilises Azure for hosting, identity management, and AI integration.  
  
Key Features:  
Parents/Guardians  
- Submit and track purchase requests.  
- Communicate with teachers and enrichment staff.  
- Access an AI chatbot for assistance.  
- Receive email updates on order statuses.  
  
Teachers  
- Review, approve, or deny purchase requests.  
- Request additional information.  
- Forward approved requests to enrichment staff.  
  
Enrichment Staff  
- Finalise purchase requests approved by teachers.  
- Address communication issues and manage vendor interactions.  
  
Vendors  
- Maintain product/service details.  
- Submit invoices linked to specific students.  
  
Administrators  
- Oversee system operations and manage orders.  
- Correct order details, handle user data, and configure funding rules.  
- Generate and analyse detailed reports.  
  
Technical Stack:  
- Frontend: React.js for a responsive, cross-device user interface.  
- Backend: Node.js with Express.js for API management and business logic.  
- Database: Azure SQL for data storage (users, orders, invoices, funding rules).  
- Hosting: Azure App Services using containerized applications managed via Azure Container Registry.  
- Identity Management: Entra ID (Azure AD) for authentication and role-based access control.  
- AI Integration: Azure AI Chatbots for support and order tracking.  
  
Responsibilities:  
- Design, develop, and maintain both frontend and backend components.  
- Collaborate on feature design and implementation.  
- Ensure the platform is user-friendly, responsive, and accessible to all user roles.  
- Integrate AI-driven functionalities to enhance user experience.  
- Document processes and provide ongoing support.  
  
Requirements:  
- Proven expertise in full-stack development, specifically with React.js and Node.js.  
- Familiarity with Azure services, including Azure SQL, Azure App Services, and Azure AI.  
- Experience with identity management systems, preferably Entra ID.  
- Strong grasp of responsive design principles.  
- Excellent problem-solving skills and a team-oriented approach.  
  
Project Timeline:  
The project is currently in development, with immediate priorities in building and testing. A beta release is targeted within the next three months, followed by continuous iteration based on user feedback.

I need to find out the following:  
\- how many contacts a given user has taken (registered) in a given month of
the year

user /per given month

week (e.g. Friday, 5pm) and create a bar chart for the current month

weeks of the year (so once per week we calculate and add it into a new sheet

\- Provide GHL support to our SaaS clients, ensuring they have a seamless experience.  

Automation Building:  
\- Design, build, and optimize automations in GoHighLevel, Zapier, and ManyChat to streamline business processes.  
\- Continuously improve our GHL SaaS platform for enhanced performance and user experience.  

Funnel and Landing Page Editing:  
\- Create and edit funnels and landing pages within GoHighLevel to support marketing campaigns and lead generation efforts.  
\- Optimize pages for conversion and user engagement.  

Administrative Support:  
\- Organize and categorize business data to ensure everything is always in order.  
\- Assist the leadership team with tasks they do not have time for, following detailed instructions provided.  
\- Collaborate with team members to ensure workflows are optimized and deadlines are met.  
\- Communicate effectively to clarify tasks and provide regular updates on progress.  

Requirements:  
Expertise in GoHighLevel CRM:  
\- Proven experience managing and optimizing GoHighLevel CRM systems.  
\- Ability to troubleshoot and resolve issues within the platform.  

Automation Skills:  
\- Expert at building complex automations using GoHighLevel, Zapier, and ManyChat.  
\- Strong understanding of automation best practices and workflow optimization.  

Technical Proficiency:  
\- Familiarity with spreadsheets (Excel, Google Sheets) for data management.  
\- Experience with funnel and landing page creation and editing.  

Communication Skills:  
\- Excellent verbal and written communication skills.  
\- Speedy responsiveness and ability to work collaboratively with a remote team.  

Personal Attributes:  
\- Highly organized and reliable.  
\- Eager to learn and adapt in a fast-paced environment.  
\- Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.  

Technical Requirements:  
\- Reliable internet connection to perform all job duties without interruption.  

Preferred Qualifications:  
\- Experience with email marketing tools or campaign management software.  
\- Prior experience in a virtual assistant role or similar administrative positions.  
\- Familiarity with SaaS platforms and providing client support.  

What We Offer:  
\- Long-Term Growth: This is a long-term position with ample opportunities for personal and professional growth within the company.  
\- Training & Development: We provide further training to ensure your success and help you advance your skill set.  
\- Dynamic Team Environment: Work alongside a passionate team dedicated to making a significant impact in the email marketing industry.  
\- Flexible Work Arrangement: Enjoy the benefits of remote work with a flexible schedule tailored to your availability.  

How to Apply:  
If you are dependable, skilled in GoHighLevel and automation, and take pride in delivering high-quality work, we’d love to hear from you!  

To apply, please fill out this form:  
<https://forms.gle/eJpuqVmJLfjKgh5CA>  

Please include the following in your application:  

A brief overview of your background and interest in this role.  
Details of your experience with GoHighLevel, automation building, CRM management, and related tasks.  
Your availability and preferred working hours.  
Budget and Timeline:  

Budget: To be discussed during the interview call.  
Timeline: We are looking for someone to join our team long-term, with plenty of room to grow alongside us.  
Join Us:  

Become a vital part of the GrowthWriter team and contribute to empowering aspiring email marketers worldwide. Your expertise will help shape the success stories of our members and the growth of our company.  

We look forward to connecting with you!

021877583859563826580.description:
So this project is already built but there are issues with the AI agent that’s generating the tweets now. So I mainly need someone that can fix this.  
Check out this loom to understand the issue: <https://www.loom.com/share/0997a20cb41c4d438ff8b9e372879abb>  
In simple terms, we need to make the tweet generation feature perfect.  
  
So this is the current flow of the app:  
\- using apify to scrape tweets from a persons profile on X  
\- using the scraped tweets to GPT-4o to understand the tweeting behaviours and style and generate tweets  
  
(But this is not giving good enough outputs)  
So we need to either do SFT (supervised fine tuning) to a model. Or any other approach that you think might work. We could also build some type of RAG architecture to make this better. Open to ideas.  
  
At the end of the day, the product needs to replicate the tweeting style of a person. So let’s say they don’t use capital letters, our agent shouldn’t use it. If they don’t use hashtags, our agent don’t use it. If they don’t use emojis, our agent shouldn’t use that either. But let’s say they use slangs and gen z terminology, then our agent shouldn’t pick up that pattern and use that. Let’s say the user says some bad words frequently, the agent should also use that.  
  
Basically it needs to feel like that real person is tweeting, whatever it takes to get there.  
  
AI generated responses will automatically be declined. And the budget is fixed. Ideally need this done in a week max.
021877583859563826580.title: Improve an already built Twitter AI Agent that can replicate tweeting behaviours from a X user

021877550075414326100.description:
Develop a backend system that scrapes API endpoints and payloads from a website, enabling seamless automation without any frontend interaction. The system should operate entirely in the backend, handling HTTP requests and responses programmatically.  
  
Core Functionalities  
API Scraping  
  
Request Interception:  
Capture API calls and payloads from the website during interactions by monitoring network traffic.  
Payload Extraction:  
Extract headers, cookies, query parameters, and body data for analysis.  
Endpoint Mapping:  
Store and organize API endpoints for reusability.  
Backend Task Automation  
  
HTTP Request Automation:  
Generate and send requests (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE) using libraries like requests (Python) or Axios (Node.js).  
Authentication Management:  
Handle login flows using session cookies, JWT tokens, or OAuth mechanisms.  
Workflow Automation:  
Execute repetitive tasks like form submissions, data uploads, and fetching information using backend API calls.  
Error Handling and Recovery  
  
Dynamic Error Detection:  
Identify issues like rate limits, invalid payloads, or expired sessions.  
Retry Mechanisms:  
Implement retry logic with exponential backoff for failed requests.  
Logging Errors:  
Maintain a log of all failed requests for debugging and resolution.  
Data Management  
  
Data Storage:  
Store response data in structured formats like JSON or in a database (MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB).  
Parsing Responses:  
Extract meaningful information from response payloads (e.g., JSON, XML).  
Export Options:  
Enable exporting data to CSV, Excel, or other user-friendly formats.  
Performance Optimization  
  
Multi-Threading:  
Execute multiple API requests concurrently for higher throughput.  
Rate Limit Management:  
Add configurable delays or token-bucket algorithms to adhere to rate limits.  
Caching:  
Cache frequently used API responses to minimize redundant calls.  
Security Features  
  
Data Encryption:  
Encrypt sensitive data like API keys, tokens, and stored payloads.  
Session Persistence:  
Maintain session continuity by securely storing and reusing cookies or tokens.  
Anti-Bot Evasion:  
Handle anti-bot mechanisms (e.g., CAPTCHAs) using external APIs like 2Captcha or AI-based solvers
021877550075414326100.title: Backend Automation Bot Requirements

Realistic Test Data  
The data submitted should look genuine (e.g., realistic names, emails, and phone numbers) but must not include real contact information.

021877655036402474513.description:
Bot Requirements:  
  
✅ 1. Signal Generation Logic (A-Level Breakout & Engulfing Pattern):  
  
The bot must follow these steps to generate a trade signal:  
  
A-Level Breakout (Buy Signal):  
  
The bot should detect two consecutive A-level breaks to confirm a bullish
breakout.  
  
After detecting the second A-level break, the bot must check if a bullish
engulfing pattern occurred before the breakout.  
  
Once the conditions are met, the bot will place a buy trade.  
  
V-Level Breakout (Sell Signal):  
  
The bot should detect two consecutive V-level breaks to confirm a bearish
breakout.  
  
After detecting the second V-level break, the bot must check if a bearish
engulfing pattern occurred before the breakout.  
  
Once the conditions are met, the bot will place a sell trade.  
  
✅ 2. Risk Management (Dynamic Lot Size Calculation):  
  
The bot must use 100x leverage and automatically calculate the lot size based
on the following criteria:  
  
Stop Loss (SL) Placement:  
  
For a buy trade, the SL should be placed below the box of the engulfing
pattern.  
  
For a sell trade, the SL should be placed above the box of the engulfing
pattern.  
  
Lot Size Calculation:  
  
The bot must automatically calculate the lot size based on the distance
between the entry price and the stop loss to ensure the risk percentage
remains within my preferred limit.  
  
The bot must account for the 100x leverage to optimize position sizing. Will
explain and provide formula.  
  
  
✅ 3. Trade Execution Logic:  
  
The bot should execute trades at the close of the candle that confirms the
breakout.  
  
The bot should ensure that only one trade is taken per breakout level.  
  
If an opposite signal is generated, the bot must close the current trade and
place a new one accordingly.  
  
✅ 4. Customization Options:  
  
The bot should include customization options for the following:  
  
Risk percentage per trade.  
  
Timeframes for detecting A-level/V-level breakouts and engulfing patterns.  
  
Lot size calculation formula adjustments (if needed).  
Take profit settings (optional).  
  
✅ 5. Chart Annotations:  
  
The bot should display key elements on the chart, including:  
  
A-level and V-level breakout lines.  
  
Engulfing patterns with labeled boxes.  
  
Entry points, stop loss levels, and trade direction (e.g., “Buy Signal” or
“Sell Signal”).  
  
Dynamic stop loss and lot size information.  
  
Technical Requirements:  
  
The bot must be compatible with MetaTrader 5 (MT5).  
It should handle multiple currency pairs and timeframes simultaneously.  
  
The code should be optimized for real-time trading performance.  
  
Deliverables:  
  
Fully functional MT5 EA file (.ex5) and source code (.mq5).  
Detailed documentation on installation, configuration, and usage.  
  
Post-delivery support for bug fixes or minor adjustments.  
  
We also need to see back testing of the bot.
021877655036402474513.title:
MT5 EA Advisor Bot for A-Level Breakouts, Engulfing Patterns, and
Automated Risk Management

021877892163507034000.description:
am seeking an experienced and skilled AI Engineer to collaborate on the development of an AI App,  designed to integrate conversational AI with engaging user experiences. This project requires a talented individual who is proficient in React-Native, Python, and other essential tools for SaaS app development. Beyond technical expertise, I am looking for someone who can also act as a mentor, guiding me through the development process as I actively participate and learn.  
  
The app focuses on providing users with tailored conversational experiences, a gamified quiz system, and an engaging onboarding process. Your role will involve fine-tuning AI models, building scalable components, and integrating backend services like Firebase to ensure a robust and user-friendly experience. In addition, you will help streamline and clean up the existing project files to establish a maintainable and scalable codebase.  
  
Responsibilities:  
You will be responsible for developing key features of the app, including integrating fine-tuned AI models capable of delivering conversational responses tailored to specific scenarios. This includes implementing an interactive chatbot, quiz functionality, and gamification features, all while maintaining an intuitive and visually appealing interface.  
  
Another crucial aspect of the project is backend integration, where Firebase will serve as the primary database for user management, real-time interactions, and data storage. You will ensure seamless integration and guide me through setting up and configuring these services.  
  
Throughout the development process, you will act as a mentor, explaining your approaches, decisions, and best practices. Your guidance will help me understand not only the technical aspects of the app but also the thought process behind scalable and efficient development.  
  
Requirements:  
To succeed in this role, you must have proven experience with React-Native for mobile app development and Python for backend integration. Familiarity with Firebase for user authentication, database management, and cloud functions is essential. You should also have experience fine-tuning AI/ML models and integrating them into mobile applications.  
  
Your ability to clean up existing code, optimize performance, and implement scalable solutions is vital. Equally important is your ability to communicate clearly, collaborate effectively, and mentor someone who is eager to learn the intricacies of app development.  
  
Deliverables:  
The end goal is to create a fully functional mobile app with a conversational AI chatbot, a gamified quiz system, and seamless navigation between features. The app should include a clean and scalable codebase, Firebase integration for backend services, and detailed documentation for future updates.  
  
If you are passionate about combining AI with innovative SaaS solutions and enjoy mentoring, this project offers an exciting opportunity to work on a unique app while making a meaningful impact. Please share examples of similar projects you’ve worked on and outline how you would approach this role. Together, we can create something extraordinary!

021877839886707203601.description:
We are seeking an experienced AI/ML Engineer to troubleshoot and resolve issues with our AI-powered document management system, NaviOwl. The system links invoices to contracts and is built using the following technologies:  
  
OpenAI GPT-4  
Azure AI Services (SQL, Bot Framework, Azure Functions)  
Vector Database for embeddings  
Microsoft Teams integration  
The Problem:  
The platform is mislinking invoices with their corresponding contracts due to issues in:  
  
Document parsing and metadata extraction  
Embedding generation and accuracy  
Data flow and query optimization between Azure SQL, Vector DB, and GPT-4  
Prompt engineering for GPT-4 responses  
Responsibilities:  
Diagnose and fix the issue with invoice-contract linking.  
Optimize the data flow between Azure SQL, Vector DB, and GPT-4.  
Improve document parsing and embedding accuracy.  
Enhance prompt engineering for better GPT-4 performance.  
Validate system outputs and ensure real-time accuracy.  
Required Skills:  
Expertise in GPT-based conversational AI (e.g., GPT-4, prompt engineering, fine-tuning).  
Experience with Vector Databases (e.g., Pinecone, Weaviate, or custom).  
Proficiency in Azure AI Ecosystem (SQL, Functions, Bot Framework).  
Strong NLP skills for document parsing and metadata extraction.  
Hands-on experience with middleware and API debugging.  
Project Scope and Timeline:  
This is a short-term, high-priority project requiring immediate attention. We aim to complete the fixes within a few weeks.  
  
If you have a strong track record in building and debugging similar systems and can deliver rapid results, we’d love to hear from you!  
  
Deliverables:  
Fully functional invoice-contract linking system with accurate outputs.  
Optimized data workflows and embeddings.  
Clear documentation of changes and updates made.  
Why Join Us?  
You’ll be working on an innovative platform and solving a real-world problem for a cutting-edge AI product integrated into enterprise systems.

021877749435834051412.description:
Project Title: Developing Intelligent Chinese Knowledge Base System--Document Database and Natural Language Query Implementation  
Project Overview: We are building an intelligent Chinese knowledge base, which aims to help students and teachers better learn and teach Chinese through efficient data collation and classification, semantic search and auxiliary learning functions. Now we need to find experienced developers or teams to help implement the following two core technology modules:  
1.Document database: Transform existing Chinese materials (texts, exercises, study guides, lesson plans, etc.) into a structured database, including semantic embedding generation and association annotation.  
2.Natural language query to SQL: Develop a system that can automatically convert users' natural language questions into SQL query statements, retrieve relevant information from the database and generate intelligent answers.  
Detailed requirements:  
1. Database of documents  
Data collation and classification:  
oDesign and create the corresponding database table structure according to the classification criteria provided, including but not limited to:  
Text table: stores the content of the text and its unique identifier.  
Resource table: stores after-class exercises, study guides, lesson plans, etc.  
Association table: stores the association information between texts and resources (such as association type: strong/weak).  
Database design:  
oExample table structure:  
Text table: ID Text title Text content embedding vector  
Resource table: ID type (exercises/guidelines/lesson plans) content embedding vector  
Association table: Text ID Resource ID Association type (strong/weak)  
Semantic embedding generation:  
oUse advanced embedding models (such as BERT, GPT, etc.) to generate vector representations of texts and related resources, and store them in databases for support vector retrieval (such as Pinecone, Weaviate, etc.).  
Relationship annotation:  
oBased on the annotation of teachers or language experts, an accurate mapping relationship between the text and its related resources is established to ensure the relevance and accuracy of the retrieval results.  
2. Convert natural language query to SQL  
Semantic search flow:  
oAfter the user enters keywords or questions, the system needs to be able to understand the user's intention, automatically generate corresponding SQL query statements, and retrieve matching texts and related resources from the database.  
oThe returned results need to be sorted according to the degree of relevance, and related resources, such as exercises, study guides, lesson plans, etc., are automatically supplemented.  
Example functionality:  
oUser search: "Contents of an article and related exercises"  
Returns:  
Contents: The full content of this article.  
Exercises: After-class exercises corresponding to this article.  
Guidelines: Learning suggestions for this article.  
Lesson plan: Teacher's explanation ideas.  
External data integration:  
oWhen the data in the database is insufficient to answer the user's question, the system should be able to obtain relevant content through external search or API, and combine it with the existing database content to generate a complete answer.  
Additional requirements:  
3. Assisted learning function (optional module)  
Knowledge points are explained step by step:  
oUse models such as GPT to generate easy-to-understand step-by-step explanations of complex Chinese knowledge points.  
Supplementary content generation:  
oAutomatically generate illustrations, example sentences, and small tests to help students consolidate their knowledge.  
Context-related display:  
oAfter students enter knowledge points, they will display relevant extended content and background knowledge to provide comprehensive learning resources.  
Skill Requirements:  
Database design and management:  
oFamiliarity with relational databases (e.g. MySQL, PostgreSQL) or non-relational databases (e.g. MongoDB).  
oExperience uses vector databases (e.g., Pinecone, Weaviate) for semantic embedding storage and retrieval.  
Natural language processing (NLP):  
oFamiliar with using NLP models (such as BERT, GPT) for text embedding and semantic understanding.  
oProject experience converting natural language to SQL queries.  
Programming languages and frameworks:  
oProficient in Python or other programming languages suitable for NLP and database operations.  
oFamiliarity with using relevant NLP libraries (e.g. spaCy, Transformers) and database interfaces.  
API development and integration:  
oBe able to develop RESTful API to realize data interaction between front and back ends.  
oExperience integrating 3rd party APIs, particularly in data acquisition and processing.  
Project Management and Collaboration:  
oGood communication skills, able to understand project requirements and complete tasks efficiently.  
oExperience with version control tools such as Git.  
Project Delivery:  
Stage 1: Complete the database design and construction, import the initial data, generate and store semantic embedding.  
Stage 2: Develop natural language query to SQL module to realize basic query functions.  
Stage 3: Optimize the retrieval and answer generation logic to ensure the accuracy and relevance of the answers.  
Stage 4 (optional): Integrate assisted learning functions to improve user experience.  
Project budget: Please make a reasonable quotation according to your experience and project needs.  
Project duration: It is hoped that the entire project will be completed within [specific time frame, such as 3 months], which can be negotiated according to the development progress.  
How to apply: Please provide the following information so that we can better understand your abilities and experience:  
1.Relevant project experience and case sharing.  
2.A brief description of the technical proposal, explaining how you will implement the above requirements.  
3.Project quotation and estimated completion time.  
4.Other information that you feel will be helpful in the application.  
Looking forward to cooperating with you to build an efficient and practical intelligent Chinese knowledge base system!
021877749435834051412.title: Developing Intelligent Chinese language Base System

021877828133433838996.description:
I am an insurance expert, and part of my role involves reviewing and correcting reports written by experts in training. These reports are often sent to me via Microsoft Teams or Outlook, and I am looking to automate this process with the help of artificial intelligence.  
  
The goal of this project is to develop a solution that can analyze Word and PDF documents, detect inconsistencies or missing information, and either annotate the document directly or provide a detailed summary of corrections. The solution must also integrate with Microsoft tools (Teams and Outlook) to streamline communication and feedback.  
  
In my work, I rely on a set of conventions and rules specific to the insurance industry. These include guidelines tied to specific damage thresholds, which dictate the coverage and management of claims. I will provide these conventions and participate in the AI training process to ensure the system delivers accurate and contextually relevant feedback. I trust the developer to propose the most effective way to implement this training.  
  
What I Need the Solution to Do:  
  
Document Analysis and Annotation:  
Identify missing details, errors, or inconsistencies in Word and PDF documents.  
Annotate directly in the document or create a structured summary of required corrections.  
Example: Highlight a missing detail in the section “Causes and Circumstances” and suggest adding specifics about the origin of damages.  
Feedback Generation:  
  
Summarize missing or incorrect elements in a clear, actionable format.  
Provide page-by-page or line-by-line feedback when applicable.  
  
Microsoft Integration:  
Seamlessly connect with Microsoft Outlook and Teams to retrieve emails and documents.  
Automate responses to team members with annotated reports or summarized feedback.  
AI Training on Insurance Conventions:  
  
Integrate insurance-specific conventions and rules that dictate claim coverage based on damage thresholds.  
Adapt the AI to provide recommendations that align with these conventions.  
  
Deliverables:  
An AI-powered tool capable of:  
Reading and analyzing Word and PDF documents.  
Annotating documents or generating a detailed summary of corrections.  
Integration with Microsoft Outlook and Teams for efficient communication and document sharing.
021877828133433838996.title: AI Solution for Automated Insurance Report Review and Annotation

021877815442328657425.description:
I need help with building two different MVP's.  
  
1. Research tool  
  
The goal is to fetch data from Google reviews, Google, News websites, social media channels, blogs, market reports, company registers, podcasts, webinars, databases, pictures, videos and other relevant channels  
  
Input scope: It should give results from people and companies..So if my client as a CEO wants to find data from some of their clients (company and contact person) so that they can provide a more personal service then it should be able to provide insights for both situations (company and individual)  
  
Output scope: text, pictures, videos, charts, tables...  
  
I dont have any APIs in mind - if you can suggest that would be great  
  
I dont have a specific tech in mind either - you can suggest based on best practices  
  
Use cases  
  
1. CEO can research competition and compare their own business vs competitive advantage insights, having a better understanding of the global market trends and using that information to create interesting content (the software should suggest this as well)  
2. Social media managers - are spending a lot of time on research about their clients. So same idea as above  
3. Sales - Same as above  
4. Better understanding of competitive advantages, news and market compared to the users company so that they can create more impactful content  
  
2. Phone interview tool  
  
I'm a headhunter so my goal is to help with my own work and I would need an autonomous AI agent to handle tasks like  
  
- when an application arrives the AI assistant sends them an email suggesting a phone call  
- the assistant would handle the phone call based to questions I want to know and maybe some additional questions from the applicant's CV (if possible)  
- if the AI agent could also learn to ask questions during the phone conversation that would be great  
- then I would get the insights of that first phone call in text format so that I can determine if I should schedule a next interview myself  
- in a best case scenario the assistant would send the applicant this one particular personality analysis test to be filled out. AND AFTER THIS the assistant would analyse that result, analyze the CV - AND THEN create additional questions (on top of fixed ones) for the first phase of the interview process - a phone interview  
  
So kind of like this  
  
1. step candidate send an application  
2. AI agent responds, thanks for your application, before the first interview here is a personality analysis I would like you to do  
3. Phone interview: after the candidate has done the analysis, AI agent analyses that and CV before making the call  
4. Insights: text analysis for me about the interview and personality fit and would this person be a fit / to continue the process  
  
Do these instructions make sense? Need more info?  
Would like to know about your AI projects and considering your workload, when would you be able get this done?

021877835559855918484.description:
We are seeking an experienced developer (or team) to build a scalable web crawler that will continuously gather content (text, images, and video) from a list of local news websites. Our goal is to ingest this data into a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) marketplace. The solution must be built on Google Cloud Platform (GCP) and store data in Amazon S3, with a focus on reliability, performance, and adaptability.  
  
SCOPE OF WORK  
1. Input Source (CSV of Websites)  
-We will provide a CSV file containing the domain names or specific URLs of local news websites.  
-The crawler must be capable of dynamically reading this list and adding/removing URLs from the crawl schedule.  
  
2. Crawling & Parsing  
-Text: Extract body text, headlines, author names, publication dates, etc.  
-Images: Gather image URLs or directly download and store them.  
-Videos: Identify and capture embedded video links or associated metadata (e.g., YouTube or local video players)  
-Must be able to handle basic JavaScript-rendered pages (if applicable) using headless browsing tools (e.g., Puppeteer, Playwright).  
  
3. Data Storage  
-All crawled assets (text, images, video references) must be saved to Amazon S3.  
-A clear and consistent folder structure is required (e.g., s3://bucket-name/site-name/YYYY-MM-DD/...).  
-Metadata (e.g., title, author, timestamp, tags/categories) should be stored in a structured format (JSON, CSV, or database if applicable).  
  
4. Recrawl and Scheduling  
-The crawler must run hourly by default, but this interval should be configurable (could be daily, weekly, or custom).  
-Concurrency & rate-limiting to avoid overwhelming small news sites (e.g., back-off strategies, max requests per second, etc.).  
  
5. Real-time Pipeline & Notifications  
-The system should integrate seamlessly with our RAG marketplace ingestion pipeline.  
-An optional webhook or API trigger can be included to notify us as soon as new/updated content is available.  
  
6. Monitoring & Error Handling  
-Implement robust logging (Stackdriver / Cloud Logging) and monitoring (Cloud Monitoring) for crawl statistics and errors.  
-Alerting system for any major failures or repeated timeouts.  
-Retry and exponential back-off on transient network errors or site outages.  
  
7. Scalability & Resilience  
-The crawler should be able to scale horizontally (e.g., GCP Compute Engine instances, Kubernetes, or Cloud Run).  
-Ensure fault tolerance to handle unexpected crashes, with automatic restart or job re-distribution.  
  
8. Security & Compliance  
-Respect robots.txt directives or site-specific terms of service (where appropriate/required).  
-Use secure secret management (e.g., GCP Secret Manager) for any credentials.  
-Adhere to HTTPS/SSL best practices and handle secure connections to websites.  
  
9. Documentation & Deliverables  
-Solution design document detailing architecture, technology stack, and data flow.  
-Deployment guide with step-by-step instructions (including environment setup, scaling, and how to add/remove sites).  
-Clear instructions on how to extend or modify the system to accommodate new data sources or advanced features (e.g., NLP or content tagging).  
  
TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS  
1. Language & Frameworks  
-Preferred: Python (Scrapy, Requests, Puppeteer via Pyppeteer/Playwright) or Node.js (Playwright, Puppeteer).  
-Must have familiarity with GCP services (e.g., GCE, GKE, Cloud Run, Pub/Sub).  
  
2. Infrastructure  
-Deployed on Google Cloud Platform with CI/CD pipelines (GitHub, GitLab, or Bitbucket).  
-Storage in Amazon S3 (via direct API or through bridging solutions if needed).  
-Must integrate with GCP logging and monitoring tools.  
  
3. Version Control & Testing  
-All code should be stored in a Git repository.  
-Include unit tests, integration tests, and possibly end-to-end tests for crawler functionality.  
-Peer reviews or documented code review process is a plus.  
  
4. Optional / Nice-to-Have  
-Admin UI to manage sites and crawl schedules.  
-Automated summarization or entity extraction (NLP) for better indexing.  
-Proxy management to handle any IP blocking or geofencing issues.  
-Change detection (delta updates) to store only diffs if content is unchanged.  
  
QUALIFICATIONS  
-Proven experience building web crawlers or large-scale scraping systems in production environments.  
-Solid knowledge of both GCP and AWS ecosystems  
-Familiarity with headless browsers (Puppeteer, Playwright) and rate-limiting best practices.  
-Strong understanding of HTML parsing, JSON/XML feeds, and advanced scraping strategies.  
-Ability to document code and processes thoroughly, including how-to guides and architectural decisions.  
-Excellent communication skills and willingness to provide regular progress updates.  
  
WHAT WE PROVIDE  
-A CSV with a preliminary list of local news websites.  
-Credentials/permissions for GCP and AWS (S3) as required.  
-Access to our existing RAG marketplace pipeline documentation, to ensure compatibility.  
-Clear acceptance criteria and success metrics (e.g., # of pages crawled, error rates, refresh intervals).  
  
DELIVERABLES AND TIMELINE  
1. Phase 1  
-Architectural design and deployment outline.  
-Basic crawler prototype running on GCP and storing to S3.  
  
2. Phase 2:  
-Full-scale crawler with dynamic scheduling, error handling, and logging.  
-Preliminary documentation and basic test coverage.  
  
3. Phase 3  
-Optimization for concurrency, performance tuning, and final documentation hand-off.  
-Optional extras (admin UI, NLP enhancements) based on discussion.  
  
We expect the project to start immediately and aim for a 2-4 week initial
build timeframe, with possible ongoing maintenance or enhancements afterward.  
  
HOW TO APPLY  
Please respond with:  
1. A brief portfolio or description of relevant crawler/scaling projects
you’ve worked on.  
2. An outline of your proposed architecture, technology stack, and approach.  
3. Your estimated timeline and budget range for the described scope.  
4. Any questions or clarifications you might need from us.  
  
We look forward to collaborating with a talented developer who can bring this
project to life and ensure a robust, real-time content ingestion pipeline for
our RAG marketplace. If this sounds like a match for your skill set, we’d love
to hear from you!

021877871530642120209.description:
As discussed here the detail and workflow of a case, I would like to see in
the demo:  
1. Client walkin/phone call as a prospect client. If that was a phone call
and from an unknown number, there should be a prospect record in the Telus
business connect.  
  
2.Client decides to move forward with our services, we should be able to send
a service agreement from the Zoho system which is already configured with 5-10
service agreement templates.  User chooses from the template, the system asks
for the dynamic information like name, address, email address, phone number,
type of application, fee etc(dynamic fields should be configurable).  
  
3. If possible, we should be able to send an invoice from zoho and/or from
quick books integrated system.  
  
4.Once client signs the agreement and pays the first invoice, User should be
able to mark the prospect as client and choose what type of application
clients wants from us like, PR, Work permit, visor visa, Study permit etc.
(Application types should be configurable as master data).  
  
5. Client keep sending the documents via email, outlook should be integrated
with the system so that when client send us an attachment, it automatically be
saved in clients documents. we should be able to upload documents manually as
well.  
  
6. Case is assigned to a staff member.  
  
7. USer/staff member should be able to see his/her assigned applications
only.  
  
8. Once, staff member completes the application, she should be able to assign
it to other staff member for review. Workflow/application stages should be
visually viewable. workflow stages and owners should be configurable.  
  
9. Application gets reviewed, reviewer sends the application back with
comments, to staff member.  
  
10. Application gets back to reviewers and then it gets submitted.  
  
Above is the whole life cycle of a case/application.  
Apart from the above, we should be able to see reports, like what applications
are in progress, rejected, approved etc. based on application type and custom
date range. Role based access should be configurable to determine who can see
what reports.  
We should be able to add/update any information at any stage of the
application.  
We should be able to set reminders for critical alerts on an application.  
  
When someone calls the office, his details should be popped in the Zoho CRM,
along with name, application type and status.  
  
Let me know if you have any questions.  
Thank you  
Jasvir

021877859342549454228.description:
We are seeking a skilled developer to automate our news collection and
distribution process. The perfect candidate will possess a solid foundation in
API Connectivity, data, and automation strategies. Your primary responsibility
will be to design and implement a system that effectively aggregates news
articles from diverse sources and organizes them for streamlined access, based
on very specific criteria. If you are detail-oriented and enthusiastic about
building automated solutions, we would love to hear from you!

**Problem**
Manually tracking news for over 250+ accounts, including high-profile firms,
is time-consuming, inefficient, and prone to oversight. Missing key
developments can lead to lost business opportunities, delayed responses, and
insufficient client engagement.

---We would ask that applicants suggest a very high-level solution and
justify reasoning & time estimates, as well as state experience in this
space.---

**Example Solution 1**
We propose implementing an automated solution using the AskNews AI API to
retrieve daily news articles from multiple sources. By leveraging a
comprehensive query, we can gather relevant news in a single API call,
summarizing the most important articles and delivering them via an automated
system (Slack).

**Example Solution 2**
We propose an automated solution using the Bing News Search API to retrieve
daily news articles and display them on a web front end. The system fetches
and summarizes relevant articles via a single API call and presents them in a
dynamic, user-friendly interface. Users can filter by categories, search
historical articles, and save preferences. Built with a REST API backend
(Node.js/Django/Laravel) and a responsive frontend (Vue.js/React.js), this
solution ensures real-time updates and accessibility across devices.

This innovative, story-driven running app transforms routine runs into
immersive adventures. Leveraging artificial intelligence, it generates dynamic
narratives that adapt to the runner's pace and performance, offering a
personalized and engaging fitness experience. Users can choose their preferred
genres and story themes, making every run a unique and thrilling journey.  
  
Current Development Status:  
The application is nearly finished and fully operational in terms of basic
running features and the user interface. Key functionalities such as
performance tracking, wearable device integration, and user profile management
are already implemented. However, the core AI-powered storytelling feature
remains under development.  
  
What We Need:  
We are looking for a talented developer to complete the AI component of the
app. Key responsibilities include:  
  
AI Narrative Development:  
  
Develop and integrate an AI system capable of creating engaging, adaptive
narratives based on user preferences and real-time running data.  
  
Ensure the narratives dynamically evolve according to the user’s pace,
distance, and chosen themes.  
  
  
Audio Narration and Effects:  
  
Implement real-time AI-generated voice narrations to deliver stories.  
  
Integrate high-quality music and sound effects to enhance the storytelling
experience.  
  
Leverage advanced language models or similar technologies to seamlessly

021879248816273372506.description:
We are seeking a skilled development team to build a robust(based on  new module on Frappe Framework), user-friendly HR Platform (Version 1.0) with modular components tailored to various user roles. This platform will streamline HR, recruitment, project, and financial management processes while integrating AI-driven functionalities and ensuring a responsive design for both web and mobile interfaces.  

Scope of Work  

1. User Roles  
The platform will support the following user roles:  

Admin  
Recruiter  
Sales Representative (SalesRep)  
Finance Team  
Consultant  
Customer Success  
IT/Support Team  
Candidate (External User)  
Client (External User)  

2. Modules & Features  

a. Company Management Module  
Roles: Admin, SalesRep, Recruiter, Customer Success.  
Key Features:  
Company Dashboard: View all companies, KPIs, filters (industry, region), and create/edit/delete actions.  
Company Details Page: Manage details, associated projects, and merge duplicates.  
Visit & Follow-Up Management: Log visit outcomes, reminders, and interaction history.  
Customer Satisfaction Tracking: Input and analyze metrics.  

b. Candidate Management Module  
Roles: Admin, Recruiter, HR Manager.  
Key Features:  
Candidate Dashboard: List with filters, KPIs, and quick actions.  
Candidate Profile Page: Manage information, attach CVs, track applications, and flag candidates.  
CV Parsing & Review: AI-driven CV data extraction with manual editing.  
Semantic Search: AI-powered skill-based search.  
Digital Signature Integration: Contract management with DocuSign.  

c. Job/Project Management Module  
Roles: Admin, Recruiter, Project Manager, Consultant.  
Key Features:  
Project Dashboard: Track active/past projects with KPIs and manage project details.  
AI Candidate Suggestions: Automated candidate recommendations.  
Advanced Search & Statistics: Generate and export detailed reports.  

d. Consultant Management Module  
Roles: Admin, Consultant.  
Key Features:  
Consultant Dashboard: Monitor projects and performance trends.  
Evaluation Tools: Provide feedback and insights.  
Audio/Video Call Integration: In-platform call management.  

e. Invoice Management Module  
Roles: Admin, Finance Manager.  
Key Features:  
Invoice Dashboard: Manage invoices with filters and generate/export options.  
Credit Recovery Reporting: Overdue invoice alerts.  
Consultant Commissions: Calculate and track commissions.  

f. Security & Role Management Module  
Roles: Admin.  
Key Features:  
User Management: Add/edit/delete users and assign roles.  
Access Logs: Track critical user actions.  

g. Support Module  

Key Features:  
Ticket Management: Submit and resolve support tickets.  
Support Dashboard: Display ticket KPIs.  
Notifications: Real-time ticket updates.  

h. Chat Module  
Key Features:  
Real-time Messaging and Group Chat: Facilitate communication.  
File Sharing: Enable sharing of documents.  
Searchable Chat History: Retrieve past messages and files.  

i. Settings Module  
Key Features:  
User Profile Management: Customize user preferences.  
Role-Based Access Control (RBAC): Manage permissions based on roles.  
Audit Logs: Record critical setting changes.  

j. Reporting & Analytics  
Key Features:  
Report Building: Create and export reports (PDF, Excel).  
Insights: Analyze candidate performance, project progress, and financial data.  

k. Mobile Support  
Responsive Design: Ensure seamless access on all devices.  
Acceptance Criteria  
Performance benchmarks: Load and response times.  
Robust role-based permissions and security protocols.  
Seamless integration of AI functionalities.  
User Feedback Mechanism  
Feedback collection from users.  
Admin access to manage and review suggestions.  

Requirements for the Team  
We are looking for a development team with the following qualifications:  
Proven experience in HR or enterprise software development.  
Strong skills in AI integration (CV parsing, semantic search, recommendation systems).  
Expertise in security and role-based access management.  
Ability to deliver a responsive, mobile-friendly design.  
Familiarity with tools like DocuSign for digital signatures.  
Experience with real-time chat and support ticket systems.  
Proposal Submission  
Please include the following in your proposal:  
A brief overview of your team’s experience.  
Examples of similar projects you have completed.  
A breakdown of the estimated timeline and budget.  
Technologies and frameworks you plan to use.  
Your approach to ensuring quality and meeting acceptance criteria.  
Budget  
Open to negotiation based on expertise and scope.
