021879097199669820196.description:
At WallZap, we’re revolutionizing wall art solutions with innovative 3D Metal
Posters, and now we’re expanding into customizable rectangular Metal Posters.
To achieve this, we’re seeking a skilled developer or AI expert to create and
integrate an AI-powered image generation tool into our Shopify store, similar
to Desenio’s "Imaginator" tool (https://desenio.com/imaginator/) and
Shutterstock’s AI Image Generator
(https://www.shutterstock.com/generate/images/).  
  
This tool will allow customers to generate unique artwork by describing their
vision in text, choosing styles, and previewing their designs, creating a
highly engaging and interactive shopping experience.  
  
What You Will Do:  
AI Integration on Shopify: Develop and integrate an AI-powered text-to-image
generation tool that enables customers to create unique art pieces by
describing their vision.  
  
Example prompt: "Create a stylized, moody night scene of Gotham City, inspired
by noir and art deco architecture. Show tall, dark skyscrapers with a dramatic
skyline under a cloudy, moonlit sky. Include hints of gothic architecture with
gargoyles and archways on the buildings to evoke a classic Batman atmosphere.
In the distance, subtly feature the Bat-Signal shining through the clouds,
casting light across the city. The colors should be dark blues, grays, and
hints of yellow from the city lights, creating a mysterious, slightly eerie
vibe that complements a soaring Batman figure."  
(See the attached image generated with this description for reference.)  
  
Customization and Scalability: Build a solution that supports multiple styles,
including cartoon, pop art, anime, manga, steampunk, in addition to more
traditional styles like abstract, watercolor, and impressionism.  
  
User-Friendly Interface: Design a seamless and intuitive interface for
customers to use the tool directly on our Shopify store, similar to the user
experiences provided by Desenio and Shutterstock.  
  
Optimization: Ensure all generated images are of the highest quality and
formatted for Metal Poster production. All posters will adhere to our standard
size of 430 x 305 mm, and images must be optimized for this format.  
  
API Development/Integration: Leverage existing AI services (e.g., MidJourney,
DALL·E, or custom AI models) or create a tailored AI model to meet our
specific requirements.  
  
Ongoing Support: Provide ongoing maintenance and updates to the tool as
needed, ensuring its reliability and functionality.  
  
Requirements:  
Proven experience with AI image generation technologies (e.g., Stable
Diffusion, MidJourney, DALL·E, or custom AI models).  
Proficiency in Shopify app development and API integration.  
Strong understanding of image processing and optimization for print,
particularly adapting outputs to specific sizes and formats (e.g., 430 x 305
mm).  
  
Experience in creating user-friendly and interactive interfaces.  
  
Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate closely with our
team in English.  
  
Solution-oriented with attention to detail and a focus on delivering a premium
user experience.  
  
Project Deliverables:  
A fully functional AI-powered text-to-image tool integrated into our Shopify
store.  
  
Customizable options for different art styles, with a focus on both
traditional and nerd-centric themes (e.g., anime, steampunk, pop art).  
  
High-resolution, print-ready outputs formatted for 430 x 305 mm Metal Posters.  
  
  
What We Offer:  
The chance to work on a unique project at the intersection of art and
technology.  
  
The opportunity to establish a long-term partnership for ongoing updates,
support, and potential future AI projects.  
  
Competitive compensation and flexible collaboration terms.  
  
Application Instructions:  
Interested candidates should submit a proposal detailing their experience with
AI image generation and Shopify development. Include examples of similar
projects you’ve worked on and highlight how your expertise aligns with our
needs.  
  
Please outline:  
  
Your proposed approach to developing this tool.  
  
Your rate (fixed fee for the initial development).  
  
Your availability for long-term collaboration (hourly rate for ongoing
support).  
  
We’re excited to bring this vision to life and look forward to collaborating
with a talented professional who shares our passion for innovation and
creativity!

We are seeking an experienced Full-Stack Developer to enhance a government contract proposal automation platform. The project involves API integration, improving the proposal generator, and restructuring the user interface to create a more seamless and user-friendly experience. The billing system is already implemented through Stripe but requires minor adjustments for better user flow.

API Integration  
Set up and automate data retrieval through external API connections.  
Filter and display data based on user-defined criteria.  
Store and manage retrieved data within a secure and searchable dashboard.  
Proposal Generator Enhancements  
Auto-populate fields (First Name to Cage Code) using user profile data.  
Add a State dropdown and a manual City field under Place of Performance Address (POPA).  
Simplify the form by removing unnecessary fields, keeping only the "Generate" button.  
Implement dynamic proposal templates and a compliance matrix generator.

Redesign the left-hand sidebar for intuitive navigation aligned with the platform’s workflows.  
Include a Team section for collaboration and a streamlined Billing section linked to the existing Stripe system.  
Optimize the Dashboard for data feeds, proposal progress, and quick actions.  
Billing System Optimization  
Make minor adjustments to the existing Stripe billing integration for better user experience.  
Implement a one-click cancellation feature that takes effect at the next billing cycle.  
Improve billing status display and user notifications related to billing.  
Ideal Candidate Skills:  
  
Frontend: React.js, Vue.js, or Angular; HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript.  
Backend: Node.js, Python (Django/Flask), or PHP.  
Database: MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB.  
API Integration: RESTful APIs, JSON, OAuth, error handling.  
Payment Systems: Experience with Stripe for subscription management.  
Security: Data encryption, secure authentication, user permissions.  
UI/UX Design: Responsive design, intuitive workflows.  
Project Management: Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.  
Deliverables:  
  
Fully integrated external API data retrieval and display system.  
Enhanced proposal generator with auto-filled user data and a streamlined form.  
UI redesign aligned with user workflows and existing Stripe billing integration.  
Testing and deployment to the live environment.

integration and implementation of AI-powered customer service agents for our

We are an innovative tech company operating in stealth mode, focused on creating a groundbreaking solution driven by autonomous AI agents. Our goal is to transform a longstanding issue in a complex field through the use of these agents.

Our MVP aims to develop an autonomous agent that can execute sequential or parallel tasks to diagnose and resolve problems within a specific domain. This agent system will:
* Function Autonomously: Execute actions independently following a predefined workflow and logic.
* Conduct Root Cause Analysis: Use the LLM's existing knowledge base and potentially incorporate Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) if necessary.

* Design and Implement: Develop a robust framework for autonomous agents using LangChain and LangGraph.

* Python Proficiency: Strong skills in Python and relevant libraries (e.g., Streamlit, OpenAI API).
* Clear Communication: Ability to explain technical concepts and collaborate effectively.

Additional Considerations:

021878506642108328788.description:
We have developed an AI-powered integration for our SaaS platform using Python, OpenAI's LLM, and LangChain. While the system performs well overall, it struggles in scenarios involving workflows with multiple dependent IDs. For example, when creating a meeting, the system retrieves product IDs, lets users select one, and uses it in the booking request. However, these workflows occasionally mix up the IDs, leading to incorrect processing.

From our research, LangGraph might offer a better approach to manage such complex workflows, thanks to its ability to handle multi-step processes and dependencies more effectively. We are seeking an expert to diagnose the issue, propose a solution, and, if needed, implement LangGraph to ensure seamless workflow execution.

021878572623996063124.description:
The Present King is a birthday reminder and gift recommendation service, helping adults find the perfect presents for children aged 0–18.
[www.thepresentking.co.uk](https://www.thepresentking.co.uk)  
  
We curate a selection of 30,000 high-quality affiliate gifts, personalised to the recipient based on age, gender, budget, and interests (e.g., “Sarah likes dressing up and unicorns”).  
  
Customers provide key details which power our gift finder (age, gender, budget, interests). The finder returns a variety of ideas influenced by these inputs.  
  
Customers create wish/ideas lists for the children’s birthdays, which in turn power reminder emails with gift ideas  
  
By leveraging AI, we aim to provide a seamless and personal gift finding experience, collecting and utilising updated child interests to refine our recommendations over time.  
  
We are seeking a talented freelancer to create a database of affiliate gift products on Xano. Initially, the data input is via CSV upload, but other affiliate marketplaces might require a scraping, or API integration.  
  
We then require the development of a gift finder tool on a platform like Bubble or webflow. This finder will take user inputs (age, gender, budget, interests) and then use AI & Xano to present the user with the best possible gift ideas. The links will then direct the user to the partner website with a view to us gaining a commission for that referral.  
  
The ideal candidate should have experience with Xano, API integration, and Webflow/Bubble.io to deliver a seamless solution.  
  
If you have a passion for creating user-friendly applications and robust databases, we would love to hear from you!  
  
- Do not contact me via email.
